docs.text: Image Augumentations ¶ サンプル写真の表示 ¶ ライブラリのimport ¶ 1 2 3 4 5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import albumentations as A import numpy as np import cv2 from PIL import Image Pillow とOpenCVそれぞれで画像を表示 ¶ 画像データはKaggleの Flowers Recognition から取得。 image_path = '../input/flowers-recognition/flowers/daisy/10140303196_b88d3d6cec.jpg' Pillow 1 2 3 4 5 6 img = Image . open ( image_path ) # img: JpegImageFile img = np . asarray ( img ) # もとの画像に戻す場合 # im = Image.fromarray(np.uint8(myarray*255)) plt . imshow ( img ) OpenCV 1 2 3 4 5 6 img = cv2 . imread ( image_path ) # img : ndarray (N-dimensional array, np.arrayによって生成) img = cv2 . cvtColor ( img , cv2 . COLOR_BGR2RGB ) # 下記もRGB画像→BGR画像への変換 #img = img[:,:,::-1] plt . imshow ( img ) 参考 - https://nixeneko.hatenablog.com/entry/2017/09/01/000000 - https://tomomai.com/python-opencv-pillow/ Blur ¶
docs.title: Image Augmentations

docs.text: 1 2 3 4 5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import albumentations as A import numpy as np import cv2 from PIL import Image
docs.title: ライブラリのimport

docs.text: 画像データはKaggleの Flowers Recognition から取得。 image_path = '../input/flowers-recognition/flowers/daisy/10140303196_b88d3d6cec.jpg' Pillow 1 2 3 4 5 6 img = Image . open ( image_path ) # img: JpegImageFile img = np . asarray ( img ) # もとの画像に戻す場合 # im = Image.fromarray(np.uint8(myarray*255)) plt . imshow ( img ) OpenCV 1 2 3 4 5 6 img = cv2 . imread ( image_path ) # img : ndarray (N-dimensional array, np.arrayによって生成) img = cv2 . cvtColor ( img , cv2 . COLOR_BGR2RGB ) # 下記もRGB画像→BGR画像への変換 #img = img[:,:,::-1] plt . imshow ( img ) 参考 - https://nixeneko.hatenablog.com/entry/2017/09/01/000000 - https://tomomai.com/python-opencv-pillow/
docs.title: Pillow とOpenCVそれぞれで画像を表示
